thread.title: Police: Driver was drunk, texting during crash
thread.title_full: Police: Driver was drunk, texting during crash - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police: Driver was drunk, texting during crash
text:
POULTNEY, Vt. - A New York woman has a Vermont court date after police say she slammed into a parked car while drunk and texting early Saturday morning.
Police say 27-year-old Anne Short of Whitehall struck a parked truck at about 1:15 a.m. on York Street in Poultney.
Police say a breathalyzer revealed a blood alcohol content of twice the legal limit and say she was texting just before the accident.
She's set to be charged with DUI and negligent operation in November.
